about_the_game:
IMPORTANT NOTE: This game focuses on exploration and mystery. To provide a more meaningful story experience, it gradually increases the tension. The story unfolds with surreal imagery and environmental details that may not be immediately noticeable at first glance. Keep in mind that there is an unconventional difficulty system.

Warning: This game may trigger seizures in people with photosensitive epilepsy and may provoke certain phobias. It is recommended to be cautious before playing.

Amelia begins to experience terrifying surreal traumas after the death of her twin. During this period, when she starts to lose her consciousness between reality and dreams, she finds a mysterious clue from her twin, Ophelia. On a journey to reunite with "her" once again, she finds herself in the midst of mysterious and enigmatic events at the Lost Dreams Asylum. The people who once lived in this hospital were brutally murdered by the local townspeople. The survivors either lost their minds or many of them committed suicide. The five areas surrounding this town are depicted in a way that represents Amelia and her family. As a player, you will relive some memories of this dark past, while others will only be witnessed. You must try to maintain your sanity as you strive to reach the end of this hell you are "living." Will you join the ranks of the dead, or will you try to uncover the mysterious truths that even the light cannot illuminate?

• First-Person Psychological Horror Game: Experience all the terrifying and tense moments from a first-person perspective as Amelia Vanderlyn.

• Characters: Face Amelia's family and the personalities in her own mind during this journey where she searches for and tries to save her twin.

• A Living, Existing Asylum: Uncover the terrifying and mysterious events in the five areas surrounding the hospital, where Amelia came to find her twin, and set her twin free.

• Psychological Horror: Survive in this world where the complex structure of the human mind meets reality, and where the subconscious becomes reality.

• World Design: Enjoy the horror in this world, featuring puzzles and riddles tied to the tension-filled and meticulously crafted story design, all experienced from a first-person perspective with the realistic and detailed graphics offered by Unreal Engine 5.

• Standardized Difficulty: An unconventional system that forces you to think twice before making decisions. It's in your hands to make the path you progress easier or harder. Are the decisions you make really correct?

• Gameplay: In this game, you are completely defenseless. Nothing can save you from the terrifying entities that secretly wait around the next corner, at the door, where you're going, or right above you. You can interact with the environment to try to escape or become even more lost in the depths.

• Mental Health: No matter what happens, you must avoid situations that will affect your sanity. Dying is a part of this game. Maintaining your sanity will keep you from crossing to the other side.

IMPORTANT NOTE: This game focuses on exploration and mystery. To provide a more meaningful story experience, it gradually increases the tension. The story unfolds with surreal imagery and environmental details that may not be immediately noticeable at first glance. Keep in mind that there is an unconventional difficulty system.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600 / Intel i5 6600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon™ RX 580 / GEFORCE GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 28 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: System requirements may change due to the development of the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 - 64bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600x / Intel i7 6700k
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ RX 6600xt / GEFORCE RTX 3060Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 28 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: System requirements may change due to the development of the game.

short_description: The Other Me is a first-person psychological horror game delving into the realms of horror that prowl the recesses of one's psyche. Pursue the dread ruminations amidst the maelstrom of the Asylum. This game offers both mind-bending horror elements and realistic environments.
